Aim for 2019 - 20, "Enhance", 2,300 kilometres of rivers, lakes and coastal waters.

Result? Fail!

tweets.text: @craftednouns @EnvAgency Means anything you want, any time you want. Perfect.

Chief Exec of Environment Agency suggests weakening rules so that fewer UK rivers fail water quaity tests - and this is the guy who is supposed to be protecting our environment! https://t.co/I6dLOOngcK
@SevernUnlocked @severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWalesandSW @CanalRiverTrust @fishmigration @LIFEprogramme @HeritageFundM_E @kiergroup Where is this?

@SevernUnlocked @severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWalesandSW @CanalRiverTrust @fishmigration @LIFEprogramme @HeritageFundM_E @kiergroup Looks great. How‚Äôs the one at Diglis progressing programme wise? Also any chance you could suggest to interested parties a foot bridge from the Bevere island to the West side would be a spiffing idea so people from Hallow and Grimley can come and watch the fish?
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency 'Enhanced'? What did they do, put shrubs around it or build a summerhouse? No transparency or dedication and commitment to the rivers.
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK It‚Äôs a quite extraordinary - complete failure of leadership and accountability.

#1 @SevernUnlocked will restore 158 miles of river habitat, enabling endangered twaite shad to return to their migratory route after 160yrs! @severnrivers are working alongside @CanalRiverTrust @NaturalEngland & @EnvAgency - funded by the @HeritageFundUK  &  @LIFEprogramme üëä https://t.co/o2FcrSygWR
@nethersmith @EnvAgency Correct. But then you don't live in the reality distortion field that is the world of the EA and @DefraGovUK

We've responded to the @EnvAgency River basin consultation: https://t.co/9AjsBAOLUM

Take a look at our recommendations on how we can address agricultural pollution through better #soil management üíßüåø
@Calum92Stevens @GeorgeTrefgarne @EnvAgency I can assure you there is no issue with the EA's funding, it's been going up. The question is how they choose to spend it.

@Feargal_Sharkey @GeorgeTrefgarne @EnvAgency I almost think they miss the targets on purpose and blame lack of funding. Like let's set our targets way high, then when we fail we can blame the big bad Tories.

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Just want to make sure I have this right.  They set the bar themselves really low (actually non existent as undefined - ‚Äúenhance‚Äù).  And then they failed to get over the low bar they set themselves.  In any business, management would be fired or resign.
@michaelbellam10 @EnvAgency Few lads I know do, they work on the ground. Just as frustrated as the rest of us.
Our Seven Wonders are just a handful of our favourite projects from the past year. They demonstrate the power of collaborative working, and instil us with optimism for the rivers of tomorrow ‚ú®

Transporting waste around the world is part of a multi-million-pound industry, and waste criminals can take advantage of this.  

Port officer Melvyn blogs about how he helps prevent illegal exports of waste to help protect our environment: https://t.co/p2B04tOYSo https://t.co/qCRbaZGPzr
